content:
I’m on a train, and trying to browse the mathlib docs at https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/ is … tedious. Is there an easy way to have it locally?

ah, maybe lake -Kdoc=on build Mathlib:docs. Let’s see…

Hmm, doesn't go through. Oh well, grep works too :-)
Joachim Breitner has marked this topic as resolved.
